source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Homemaker's Guide: Sewing Fundamentals
items.headline: Learn the basic's of sewing and brush the dust off that forgotten sewing machine
objectives_summary: Students will have the knowledge to properly wind a bobbin, thread their machine, and create beginner level projects.

items.title: DIY Orgonite Energetic Art
items.headline: Energetic Art, planning and making Orgonite Energetic Art to keep your living environment clear from energetic pollution
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will know a more about the history of Orgonite and Energetic Art, its roots and uses. This course is not for those with limited mind Sets that keep them in small, restricted life styles.

items.title: Painting with colored pencils
items.headline: Paint with your colored pencil, a fun addition to your workflow
objectives_summary: painting with colored pencils
How to evolve your pencil coloring into great looking paintings
Discover how to paint with colored pencils using various styles and techniques

items.title: Pencil Drawing : Ultimate Hyper Realistic Portrait Drawing
items.headline: Comprehensive Hyper-real Portrait Drawing and Sketching, Art of Portrait Drawing & Shading step by step, Pencil Drawing
objectives_summary: -	Getting to know about the required tools for sketching the face
-	The principles of precise transfer of the model to the paper with the use of chequered lines
-	Basic tutorial of sketching and shading with brushes

items.title: From Idea to Finished Illustration
items.headline: Go from idea to composition, sketch and shaded drawing to an illustration with watercolor, pen & ink or alcohol markers
objectives_summary: Go from an idea to a finished illustration
Introduction to composition
Introduction to drawing

items.title: Watercolor Botanical Series: Paint Tulips Step by Step
items.headline: Paint simple flowers mastering watercolor techniques and prepare for advanced tulips painting
objectives_summary: How to sketch tulips and prepare your paper and materials for the painting.
How to use wet-on-wet technique to create underpainting and prepare your flowers.
How to master layering technique to achieve deep tone and create volume.

items.title: Draw Realistic Eye, Nose, Ear, Lip In Pencil Shading Medium
items.headline: Black & White Magic By Pencils
objectives_summary: Students will able to do realistic pencil shading in any kind.....& Also can make eye, nose, ear & lip also in realistic way
Will understand pencil shading work how to perform
Hesitation & fear about pencil shading work is gone past

items.title: Creative Fundamentals of Floristry: Contemporary Bouquet #1
items.headline: Learn how to design a creative hand tied bouquet.
objectives_summary: Create a hand held bouquet

items.title: Coloring For Happiness: Max Cuddleecat

visible_instructors.title: Cindy Wider
visible_instructors.job_title: Art Educator, Artist and Co-Founder of DrawPj.com
visible_instructors.name: Cindy

items.headline: Join Cindy Wider on a wonderfully relaxing colored pencil journey
objectives_summary: My special 'One Pencil Tip - 4 ways' preparation  (this will save you time and money!)
How to color 'Max Cuddleecat' from start to finish
Where to place highlights and shadows

items.title: Watercolor Workout - Basics & Beyond

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.name: Robert

items.headline: Learn to master the watercolor characteristics
objectives_summary: Learn the characteristics of watercolors
Learn to NOT control the uncontrollable
Learn that 'happy accidents' are a gift

items.title: Drawing: How to Draw Figure & Sketches of Children
items.headline: Drawing & Art Course with sketches Drawing
objectives_summary: Drawing
Figure drawing
Sketching

items.title: How to Draw Figures in Landscapes with Pastel Pencils
items.headline: Learn how to draw beautiful rural landscapes using Pastel Pencils. Trees, People, Horses, Mist and More!
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw Rural Landscapes
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: Sketchbook Everyday: Painting Flowers in Watercolor

visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer
visible_instructors.name: Mandar

items.headline: Drawing, value study and step by step painting instructions
objectives_summary: Learn to draw simplistically
Paint confidently with watercolors
Build a habit of everyday painting

items.title: Boost your Creativity and become an Illustrator
items.headline: Learn how to use your own memories and life experience to trigger your creativity and become an illustrator
objectives_summary: Learn to think outside the box and create interesting art.
How to work with symbolism and symbols.
How our brain search for patterns and how to use that in your art.

items.title: Your Craft Business: Step By Step Guide To Make Money Online
items.headline: Start Your Craft Online Business And Monetize Your Expertize
objectives_summary: Secret Formula Of Successful Art/Craft Business
Create automated sales process
Profile the ideal customer that will most-easily be converted into a paying customer

items.title: Drawing Pencil Portraits - Basic Techniques and More
items.headline: Learn to draw beautiful realistic portraits as well as sketch less detailed ones.
objectives_summary: Drawing Portraits
Pencil Portraits
Pencil Portrait Fundamentals
